name: emotionalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who feels and expresses strong emotions: The character he plays is an emotionalist, with all his feelings on display. Emotionalists tend to allow their emotions, rather than their reason, to guide them through the world. Related words
emotional
emotion
More examplesFewer examplesHe's an unapologetic emotionalist, pouring his passion into his playing.As an emotionalist, she is influenced by everything she sees and feels around her.I'm not shy on stage; I'm an emotionalist.This emotionalist approach to conservation risks only animals with sentimental appeal being protected.
